Rule.name: Make the initiator think the responder is a better buddy (maybe should be the other way around?)

InfluenceRule.name: Clumsy peple more often need backup
Confident people more often ask for back up
Smooth talkers ask for backup because they're better as convincing people to give backup
Domineering people don't want help
Arrogant people don't want help
Pacifists are willing to ask for help
Weaklings need backup
Self destructive people don't want help
Competative people don't want help from those they think are cool
Stubborn people don't want to ask for help
Outgoing people are willing to ask for help
People are willing to ask help from buddies
Men don't like asking help from romantic interests
Embarassed people don't like asking for help
Desperate people want help
Popular people can ask for help
Extroverted people who feel out of place ask for help
People don't ask for help of those they feel superior to
People can ask friends for help
People can ask people they're dating for help
i homewrecked r
facade
Cold people don't give help
Kind people give help
Loyal people give help
Sympathetic people give help
Mean people don't give help
Arrogant people don't give help
Domineering people don't give others help
Vengeful people who have been wronged won't help you now
Loving peole give help
People help friends
People help those they are dating
People who feel guilty are more likely to help others
People who feel out of place are more likely to help others
People want to help those they have crushes on
People don't help those they are angry at
People don't help those they want to pick on
People don't help those they are annoyed with
People help those they are scared of
Competative people don't help those they envy
Jealous people don't help those they envy
People don't help those they feel superior to
People don't help those who have cheated on them

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% %pron(r,was/were)% generous with %pron(r,his/her)% cheezeytoos
%r% wouldn't let %i% copy off %pron(r,his/her)% test
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% creepy into %ip% request to be %pron(i,his/her)% fake %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend
%list(i,r,and)% went all wonder twins on %o%
%i% tried to get %r% to help against %o% but %prons(r,he/she)% like changed sides
%i% learned that this prom week carol was all an elaborate ruse, but got to date %r% anyway
%list(r,o,and)% used that prom week carol thing to tell %i% that %pron(o,he/she)% had moved on
%r% felt no remorse for %pron(r,his/her)% unfriendly behavior towards %i%
%r% apologized for being a bad friend to %i%
%r% helped %i% make a decision concerning %o%
%r% refused to tell %i% %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend %op% favorite color
%r% lent %i% exactly $2.08 with no questions asked
%r% made excuses to avoid helping %i% out
%i% tried to get %r% to help %pron(i,him/her)% out but %prons(r,he/she)% said the old %r% was dead
%r% helped %i% out with that embarrassing problem
%i% bullied %r% into helping %pron(i,him/her)% out
%r% stood up to %ip% threatening requests for help
%r% helped %i% study for that math exam
%r% refused to help %i% study for the science quiz
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% a little too down to give %i% a ride home
%r% told %i% %prons(r,he/she)% loved %pron(i,him/her)% out of nowhere and it was awkward city
%r% promised to see %i% through %pron(i,his/her)% 'it's complicated' woes
%r% told %i% %prons(r,he/she)% would under no circumstances support %pron(i,his/her)% dishonest relationship with %o%
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% totally chill about becoming %ip% new lab partner
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% just too cool to do whatever favor %is% had in mind
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% a friend in need
%r% let %i% down in %pron(i,his/her)% moment of need
%r% lent %i% %pron(r,his/her)% %CKB_((r,has),(,),())%
%r% refused to lend %i% %pron(r,his/her)% %CKB_((r,has),(,),())%
%r% helped %pron(r,his/her)% sweetie out
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% feeling increasingly uncomfortable about this whole night

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I forgot my lunch at home. I'm gonna starve!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's cool, take my cheezeytoos!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks! You're the best!!
Oh crap! I forgot to study for our test!! Let me copy off of you!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hah! No way! Remember what happened to me the last time I let you do that!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Four weeks detention is like nothing! I thought you had my back!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: After that? Sorry, you thought wrong.

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - Difference of Romantic Opinion Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I need a huge favor!!!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I need you to pretend we're dating, so I can avoid someone who won't leave me alone!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: REALLY!??! This is everything I've hoped and dreamed for!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhh... it's just for a minute... don't get too excited...
OK, this is gross. Stop drooling.

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - Two friends unite against a common foe

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... can I ask you for a favor?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o% has really been in my grill lately. I need some help taking %pron(o,him/her)% down a peg.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sounds good to me, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh oh... here's our big chance.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Well if it isn't %pejorative% Dee and %pejorative% Dumb. What's the matter, %rand(two half wits trying to make a whole,losery loves company,practicing for that three-legged-no-brain race)%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Shut up %o%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Individually we may be easy pickings for you, but when our powers combine...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: We are Unstoppable!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We are Unstoppable!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: This power... is this the power of... friendship?
You've won this time, %i% and %r%, but I'll be back!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That went really well!
LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wow! That was great!

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - Two friends almost unite against a common foe

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... can I ask you for a favor?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o% has really been in my grill lately. I need some help taking %pron(o,him/her)% down a peg.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, no can do, %buddy%. I kinda like %o%.
In fact, I kinda like %o% a little more than you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What! But... but we're friends, %r%!

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: What's happening %r%? Infiltrating %pejorative% culture to destroy it from the inside?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Shut up, %o%... %r% would never betray me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Dude, I already told you, you're on your own for this. %o% and I are tight.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But... but... I thought we would unite together under the banner of friendship...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sorry, man.
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Heh! With friends like %r%, who needs enemies.
But rest assured: you have me as your enemy. Whether you need it or not.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just... I mean... how could I have thought... oh geez.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Umm, so this is awkward and I'm going to leave now. Later!

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - (SS8 Act-5) The End Of It

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! %r%, is it truly you, or some other apparition sent to haunt my dreams!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Of course its me, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Tell me, what week is it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why, Prom week.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, the Spirits have done it all in one week!
Ah, %o% is coming! Quick, back me up, %r%.
Oh, %o%, I've changed! I've learned that if I don't date you, spooky ghosts will haunt me with visions of the past!
And you'll end up with %r%.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Umm, %r%, I think we have to come clean.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o% and I were just playing with you - you didn't travel through time, it was just us pretending.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Were those kisses just 'you pretending', too?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Look %i%, I was mad at you because we broke up, and I wanted to freak you out a little bit.
But seeing you get so worked up was actually kind of cute.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: God Bless Us! Every One!

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - (SS8 Act-5) The End Of It

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! %r%, is it truly you, or some other apparition sent to haunt my dreams!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Of course its me, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Tell me, what week is it?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why, Prom week.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ah, the Spirits have done it all in one week!
Ah, %o% is coming! Quick, back me up, %r%.
Oh, %o%, I've changed! I've learned that if I don't date you, spooky ghosts will haunt me with visions of the past!
And you'll end up with %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Those weren't visions of the past or future, that was just us playing a joke on you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But, but, I saw you! The two of you will get together in the future unless I mend my vile ways!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, no, we're already dating.
We're totally into each other!
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Yeah, we weren't sure how to tell you. This seemed like the best way.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Bah, Humbug!

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - r feels kind of bad for being mean to i

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know what I really like about friends? They're always there for you.
What's the point of having a friend of they won't be there for you. Always.
So... Remember when %toc1%?
That was lame. That was really lame. That's not what friends do.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...You're right, %i%. I'll be a better friend from now on.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Okay, so. Remember when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, yeah.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That %random(was not cool,was uncool,was totally uncool,was so not cool)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, yeah?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, not okay.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(So deal.,So?,Get over yourself.,I don't care.,Whatever.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... so, you're like friends with my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, what about it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Could you help me out with something? Which does %pron(o,he/she)% like more, %toc1%s or %toc2%s?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(i,bf,gf)% and you don't know that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ummm, %random(it's hard to remember stuff like this all the time,I think I used to know but I forgot,no,I mean it's not like we've been dating forever)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I guess I'll help you out this time. %o% totally hates %toc2%s, but %pron(o,he/she)%'s super down with %toc1%s. Can't go wrong with a %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %positiveadj%. Thank you!
Hey %r%, I need some advice about %o%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, just because you're going out with my friend doesn't mean I have to like you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just need to know what %pron(o,his/her)% favorite color is.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That sounds like a personal problem.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks for nothing.
%buddy%! I've got a serious problem, you got my back?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, I guess so - isn't that what friends are for?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Phew, thank god. I just need two dollars and eight cents.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh... that's pretty specific. What for?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't say.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's weird, but whatever. Here you go, %buddy%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Never speak of this again.
Hey %buddy%, we're friends - right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Last I checked,Something like that,I suppose so)%. Why?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's just, I need a really huge favor from a friend right now. You got my back?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Gee, I don't know, %i%. %random(That sounds like too much drama,I'm kind of super busy right now,I kind of have my own problems right now,That sounds like a big commitment and I've got to focus on prom stuff right now)%.
You understand, right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh yeah, totally. Sorry about that.
So, this is weird, but I'm just going to say it: I need your help.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's priceless. Why would I *ever* do *you* a favor, %i%? You're like my sworn enemy!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know, I know. But there's no one else I can turn to.
I need the old %r% back. I need your magic.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That person doesn't exist any more, %i%. Maybe %gender(r,he,she)% never did.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey... could you... um... I was hoping maybe I could...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it %i%? Spit it out. Don't be shy.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's just... I kinda need a favor.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah... And what is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't say. It's too embarassing... Lemme text it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whoa. Yeah, that's pretty embarassing. But sure, I guess I'll help out.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks, you're the best.
Hey %pejorative%. I need a favor.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well good luck getting one with an attitude like that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ExCUSE me? Do you have any idea who you're talking to?
I'm %i%, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Bite me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You'll pay for this.
Well if it isn't my favorite %pejorative%. I need answers to next week's test, and you're gonna help me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look here, %i%. I'm tired of you walking all over people. Everyone knows you're a jerk, and I'm not putting up with it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You will if you know what's good for you, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not this time, %i%. Come at me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: .... You're lucky I'm so busy right now, %r%. This isn't the last time you'll hear from me, stupid %pejorative%face.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's what I thought.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! I'm totally screwed! I need your help!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Can you help me study for the math exam coming up? You're like, super smart and stuff!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... I am pretty smart.
Yeah, sure - why not.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh thank god I ran into you, %r%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Let me guess. You need help with something education-related.%random(, Again.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Man, how'd you know?
I'm totally gonna fail the science quiz this week. Can you help me out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why would I help you out? If you fail, the curve goes up and so does my grade.
Don't you understand the competitive structure of our educational system?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...So I guess that's a no?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's a no.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. Would you mind doing me a favor?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Anything for you, %i%...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, right. You think I could get a ride from school today?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: COULD YOU EVER! Do you need anything else? We could go get dinner, or maybe a movie...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um... No, just a ride home would be nice.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: YOU GOT IT!
%i%! How *you* doing?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Just fine, thanks. Listen, could you hook it up with a favor?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: A favor... From me? You want a favor from *me*? Am I dreaming? Pinch me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... Just a fav-

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I love you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh wow! Would you look at the time. I really must be going.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wa- wait! I was joking! You know! Eh.. heh...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... You know %o%, right?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. Aren't you two dating?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... About that. I'm kinda cheating on %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? Seriously?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... And I'm really worried about what's going to happen. So if I need you... you got my back?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, sure thing. I know how hairy those situations can be.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. So I have a confession to make. I'm... I'm cheating on %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you serious!? That's so messed up! How could you??

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know, I know. But I'm planning on breaking the news soon and I really need you to get my back.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Absolutely not! I can't believe you'd do something like that to poor %o%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What!? I thought I could count on you to help me through this trying and kind of sexy time.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I want nothing to do with this.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, you're pretty chill. Mind doing me a favor?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Chill as ice, baby. What is it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Would you be down to be my partner for the next lab?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You mean, you wanna be partners with someone as chill and as awesome as I?
Sure, why not. I guess I could assist you with my 'chillacity'.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey there cool kid. Wanna do me a solid?
But you don't even know what it is!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Too cool; don't care. Get with the times.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %buddy%, I %random(need to borrow some change,dropped my keys in the heater vent,left my books in homeroom,spilled soda all over my outfit,got gum stuck in my hair,need someone to help me kick the vending machine, need to sneak a look at Ms. Collander's grade book,need to cut class and run to the corner store)%. Can you help me out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Sure thing,No problem,Not a problem,Sure,Definitely,Glad to help)%, %buddy%. Let's do it!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the best, %r%.

Hey %buddy%, I %random(need to borrow a dollar,dropped my keys in the heater vent,left my books in homeroom,spilled soda all over my outfit,got gum stuck in my hair,need someone to help me kick the vending machine, need to sneak a look at Ms. Collander's grade book,need to cut class and run to the corner store)%. Can you help me out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, %random(not gonna happen,I don't think so,not today,sorry buddy,I would but I kinda have this other thing to do,no,right,that's not going to happen)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks for nothing, %r%.
%r%, I need a favor. Can you loan me your %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Sure, %buddy%. Uh, what do you need it for?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's kind of a long story...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well okay, just so I get it back in one piece.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %if(0,Totes)else(Absolutely)%, %buddy%. You're the best.
%r%, I need a favor. Can you loan me your %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My *%toc1%*? What the hell do you need my %toc1% for?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Come on %gender(r,dude,girl)%, just for five minutes.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're not so much as touching it for even five seconds.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%, I %random(need to borrow some change,dropped my keys in the heater vent,left my books in homeroom,spilled soda all over my outfit,got gum stuck in my hair,need someone to help me kick the vending machine, need to sneak a look at Ms. Collander's grade book,need to cut class and run to the corner store)%. Help me out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Any time,Anything for you,My pleasure,Of course,Absolutely,Allow me to assist you)%, %sweetie%. Lead the way!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the best %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend ever, %r%.

Instantiation.name: BackMeUp - Back me up Facade reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I'm hoping you can tell me where I went wrong with my decorating.
I was trying for a sort of post-modern style, but I've obviously failed, haven't I?

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Now %i%. Let's not bother our guest too much. I'm sure %pron(r,he/she)% likes the room just fine. Right %r%?
